content: Absolutely not! I'm just trying to make sure that everyone can enjoy our amazing cheese product. We understand that some people may have allergies, so we've created an allergy-free version to make sure everyone can enjoy our delicious cheese. Plus, it's made with all natural ingredients and has all the great flavor, so even if you're not a cheese fan, you'll love it! So why don't you give it a try and see what you think?
